recipeTool

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • recipeTool.GUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, Accessible, RootPaneContainer, WindowConstants

    class GUI
extends JFrame
    This class holds the Graphical User Interface.
    Author:
    Ville Salmela

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GUI()
      This constructor will populate some fields, determine whether to use database, set up the visual layout, configure components and finally check the connection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private boolean addIngredient(boolean modify)
      This method reads ingredient data from GUI and then adds a new ingredient to storage or modifies an existing one.
      private boolean addRecipe(boolean modify)
      This method reads recipe data from GUI and then adds a new recipe to book or modifies an existing one.
      private void clearFields(Segment... segments)
      This method will reset specified GUI components back to their original states.
      private void config()
      This method will perform the necessary configuration for components
      private boolean deleteIngredient()
      This method will delete one ingredient from storage and from all recipes.
      private boolean deleteRecipe()
      This method will delete one recipe from book.
      private void exit()
      This method controls closing the application.
      private void filter()
      This method will handle those UI functions, that need to be done when filtering recipes.
      private static boolean isItemNull(Object object)
      This method will check, if the passed object is null.
      private void maria(DatabaseCommand command)
      This method will handle connecting, saving, loading and test values.
      private void migLayout()
      This method will setup the Graphical User Interface layout.
      private void prepare()
      This method reduce storage values, using amount from the selected recipe.
      private void refreshFields(Segment... segments)
      This method will populate specified GUI components with new updated information.
      private void refreshLists(Segment... segments)
      This method will populate specified GUI components with new updated information.
      private void rows(int value)
      This method will add/remove input rows in iframe2_add
      private void savePreferences()
      This method will read connection preferences from GUI, and save them to a file.
      private void testConnection()
      This method will test if there is a valid connection established to a database.
      private void togglePanels(boolean enable)
      This method will enable/disable all components on all panels found in containerArrayPanels, except for labels.
      private void unitChanger(Object source)
      This method will change the unit label in Segment.CONTAINER_ADD_RECIPE, according to the ingredient which is selected in the nearby combo box.
      private void useDefault()
      This method will populate connection settings with default values.

      • state_allowDB

        private boolean state_allowDB
        This field holds the current user preference of database use.
        True; if user allows the connection to database
        False; if user denies the connection to database

      • state_counter2a

        private int state_counter2a
        This counter holds the current number of rows in internal frame, where recipe adding/modifying takes place.

      • state_filteringActive

        private boolean state_filteringActive
        This field holds the current state of filtering.
        True; if filtering is active
        False; if it's not.

        This container holds two tabs: ingredients and recipes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUI

        GUI()
        This constructor will populate some fields, determine whether to use database, set up the visual layout, configure components and finally check the connection.

    • Method Detail

      • addIngredient

        private boolean addIngredient(boolean modify)
        This method reads ingredient data from GUI and then adds a new ingredient to storage or modifies an existing one.
        Parameters:
        modify - true if user is modifying an existing ingredient, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if operation is successful, false if it fails.

      • addRecipe

        private boolean addRecipe(boolean modify)
        This method reads recipe data from GUI and then adds a new recipe to book or modifies an existing one.
        Parameters:
        modify - true if user is modifying an existing recipe, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if operation is successful, false if it fails.

      • clearFields

        private void clearFields(Segment... segments)
        This method will reset specified GUI components back to their original states.
        The GUI is divided into segments, which are mostly based on containers. See: Segment

        6 different segments are supported by this method:
        -CONTAINER_SETTINGS
        -CONTAINER_INGREDIENTS
        -CONTAINER_RECIPES
        -CONTAINER_FILTER
        -CONTAINER_ADD_INGREDIENT
        -CONTAINER_ADD_RECIPE

        Parameters:
        segments - GUI segments, which should be cleared.

      • config

        private void config()
        This method will perform the necessary configuration for components

      • deleteIngredient

        private boolean deleteIngredient()
        This method will delete one ingredient from storage and from all recipes. The method is invoked by GUI.ButtonHandler.actionPerformed(ActionEvent)
        Returns:
        true if deleted successfully
        false if deleting failed

      • deleteRecipe

        private boolean deleteRecipe()
        This method will delete one recipe from book. The method is invoked by GUI.ButtonHandler.actionPerformed(ActionEvent)
        Returns:
        true if deleted successfully
        false if deleting failed

      • exit

        private void exit()
        This method controls closing the application. The method is invoked, when user tries to close the window.
        User is asked, if he would like to save before exiting. If saving goes ok, app will exit. If saving fails, user can still go back and maybe connect to a database.

      • filter

        private void filter()
        This method will handle those UI functions, that need to be done when filtering recipes. The method is invoked, each time user presses the filtering toggle button.

      • isItemNull

        private static boolean isItemNull(Object object)
        This method will check, if the passed object is null. If the object is null, user is presented with the message:
        "You must first select an item."
        Parameters:
        object - An object to be check
        Returns:
        true if object is null, false otherwise

      • maria

        private void maria(DatabaseCommand command)
        This method will handle connecting, saving, loading and test values.
        When user click a button, this method will receive a command from GUI.ButtonHandler, gather inputed data from UI, pass the information onto RecipeTool, and finally present the user with information of success or failure.
        Parameters:
        command - a DatabaseCommand

      • migLayout

        private void migLayout()
        This method will setup the Graphical User Interface layout.

      • prepare

        private void prepare()
        This method reduce storage values, using amount from the selected recipe. If any storage value would go negative, this is prevented and user notified.

      • refreshFields

        private void refreshFields(Segment... segments)
        This method will populate specified GUI components with new updated information. The GUI is divided into segments, which are mostly based on containers. See: Segment

        5 different segments are supported by this method:
        -CONTAINER_SETTINGS
        -CONTAINER_INGREDIENTS
        -CONTAINER_RECIPES
        -CONTAINER_ADD_INGREDIENT
        -CONTAINER_ADD_RECIPE

        Parameters:
        segments - GUI segments, which should be updated with new information

      • refreshLists

        private void refreshLists(Segment... segments)
        This method will populate specified GUI components with new updated information. The GUI is divided into segments, which are mostly based on containers. See: Segment

        2 different segments are supported by this method:
        -LIST_INGREDIENTS
        -LIST_RECIPES

        Parameters:
        segments - GUI segments, which should be updated with new information

      • rows

        private void rows(int value)
        This method will add/remove input rows in iframe2_add
        Parameters:
        value - number of rows to be added(+) or removed(-).

      • savePreferences

        private void savePreferences()
        This method will read connection preferences from GUI, and save them to a file.

      • testConnection

        private void testConnection()
        This method will test if there is a valid connection established to a database.
        The method does the checking using Database.isConnected()

        Connection Icon is set and connection buttons are enabled/disabled accordingly.

      • togglePanels

        private void togglePanels(boolean enable)
        This method will enable/disable all components on all panels found in containerArrayPanels, except for labels.
        Parameters:
        enable - true to enable all panels
        false to disable all panels

      • unitChanger

        private void unitChanger(Object source)
        This method will change the unit label in Segment.CONTAINER_ADD_RECIPE, according to the ingredient which is selected in the nearby combo box.
        Parameters:
        source - A JComboBox object, where the ingredient is listed

      • useDefault

        private void useDefault()
        This method will populate connection settings with default values.
